sponsor: Alliance for Clinical Trials in Oncology
briefTitle: Vitamin D and Breast Cancer Biomarkers in Female Patients
officialTitle: Vitamin D and Breast Cancer Biomarkers
summary:
RATIONALE: Vitamin D may help prevent breast cancer.

PURPOSE: This randomized clinical trial is studying vitamin D and breast cancer biomarkers in female patients.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change (Between Baseline and Month 12) in Mammographic Density by the Boyd Method Compared Between Arms

commonTop: Neoplasms benign, malignant and unspecified (incl cysts and polyps) - Other, specify
